name: Spinner Evolution
description:
Are you a spinner? Are you avoiding the craze like the plague? Whatever your opinion, you can always enjoy spinning virtually in this quickly irrelevant spinning simulator!

Spin spinners to get spins! Spend spins to get spinners! Upgrade spinners with spins!

Credits: Design and Development

Sean Mansell (@arknano)

Models

Lite Black (@JB_LiteBlack)

https://sketchfab.com/lite
